import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from '../services/food/food.service'; import { Tag } from '../shared/models/tag'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent implements OnInit{ tags:Tag[]=[]; constructor(private fs:FoodService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.tags=this.fs.getAllTag() } }
